item.description:
Join members and guests of the SSFMG for a Walk along Wollaston Beach! Depending on the size of the group and speed of walkers, we can have a couple of small (or big) groups so everyone can buddy up. Hopefully the weather will work out and we'll have a great night!

If you have any questions about this event, please contact me. THANKS!

Wollaston Beach Walk
Tuesday, October 13th at 6pm
Caddy Memorial Park
Quincy Shore Drive
Quincy, MA
(the park by the traffic light across the street from the beach)

Event Fees: Organizer Team and Annual Members - Free, Members and Guests - $2 per person (Cash Only. Please try to bring exact change. No large bills please.)

Organizer(s): Julie O (let me know if anyone wants to co-organize)

Min/Max: At least 6 Yes RSVPs by 4pm on Tuesday, October 13th.

Attendance is unlimited.

Guests: Welcome!

RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by 4pm on Tuesday, October 13th.

Inclement Weather:
We will walk if it is overcast or there is a slight drizzle. Check back here on Thursday for an update if the weather is questionable. All Yes RSVPs will be emailed by 4pm if the event is canceled due to the weather.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: Posted on the "Directions to Frequently Used Venues" Discussion Thread on the Message Board.
item.how_to_find_us: This is the lot at the end of the beach on the opposite side of the street. We will meet by the flagpole.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Evening walk at the Beach
